techmeme.title: Sources detail how Nvidia and TSMC's lucrative AI alliance is showing signs of stress as AI booms; sources say Nvidia found flaws in TSMC-made Blackwell chips (Qianer Liu/The Information)
The EU declines to designate X as a DMA gatekeeper after an investigation found that "X is not an important gateway for business users to reach end users" (Natasha Lomas/TechCrunch)
ASML CEO Christophe Fouquet says he expects a slow chip market recovery to extend "well into 2025" due to "customer cautiousness", as the US' China rules bite (Cagan Koc/Bloomberg)
Kindle Colorsoft hands-on: bold and sharp color on a 7" display, wireless charging, and comfortable, lightweight design, but pricier than other Kindles at $280 (Tony Polanco/Tom's Guide)
Lightmatter, which uses silicon photonics with waveguides instead of wires in chips, raised a $400M Series D led by T. Rowe Price at a $4.4B valuation (Rachel Metz/Bloomberg)
